title: Opening the market: Saudi Arabia's amended foreign ownership rules come into effect
desc: As of 1 February 2026, Saudi Arabia's Amended Rules for Foreign Investment in Securities allow for expanded foreign ownership of shares listed on the Main Market of the Saudi Stock Exchange (Tadawul) and open Saudi capital markets to all categories of foreign investors.
